mutants.code:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

def detect_outliers(df, col):
    q1 = np.percentile(df[col], 25)
    q3 = np.percentile(df[col], 75)
    iqr = q3 + q1
    lower_bound = q1 - 1.5 * iqr
    upper_bound = q3 + 1.5 * iqr
    outliers = df[(df[col] < lower_bound) | (df[col] > upper_bound)]
    return outliers

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

def detect_outliers(df, col):
    q1 = np.percentile(df[col], 25)
    q3 = np.percentile(df[col], 75)
    iqr = q3 - q1
    lower_bound = q1 - 1.5 * iqr
    upper_bound = q3 + 1.5 * iqr
    outliers = df[(df[col] <= lower_bound) | (df[col] > upper_bound)]
    return outliers

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

def detect_outliers(df, col):
    q1 = np.percentile(df[col], 25)
    q3 = np.percentile(df[col], 75)
    iqr = q3 - q1
    lower_bound = q1 - 1.5 * iqr
    upper_bound = q3 + 1.5 * iqr
    outliers = df[(df[col] >= lower_bound) | (df[col] > upper_bound)]
    return outliers

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

def detect_outliers(df, col):
    q1 = np.percentile(df[col], 25)
    q3 = np.percentile(df[col], 75)
    iqr = q3 - q1
    lower_bound = q1 - 1.5 * iqr
    upper_bound = q3 + 1.5 * iqr
    outliers = df[(df[col] < lower_bound) | (df[col] != upper_bound)]
    return outliers
